name: ThiefOfWord
description:
Visit my Twitter page for more information: https://twitter.com/Hodei_X

In 'ThiefOfWord', you will have to use your math skills to open and steal safes.

Controls: keyboard/mouse.

Available languages: English, Spanish, and Euskara.

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment or a message to me explaining what happened.
